Welcome to my website! I am a Senior Health AI Scientist based in Seattle, WA. I work at the intersection of generative AI, agentic systems, and multimodal biomedical data to build reliable, interpretable, and production-grade AI systems for real-world healthcare impact.

My general professional skills and interests include:

-   responsible generative AI and agentic systems in healthcare

-   multimodal and transformer-based machine learning

-   clinical NLP and real-world healthcare data

-   translational informatics and personalized medicine

-   evaluation, governance, and human-centered AI system design

I am always open to speaking, teaching, collaboration, consulting, and outreach opportunities. Feel free to reach out to me with questions or requests at [vivek.sriram\@gmail.com](#0).
